${Sign Up}

${Encircle is Titan’s Loyalty program which allows members to earn & redeem points across all brand stores & E-commerce websites (www.titan.co.in, www.CaratLane.com).

sys_update_version.payload: customc.reg-body{ background: $brand-primary; padding: 20px; margin:20px; } #regstr-content .sign-up { font-family: Roboto; height: 29px; width: 87px; color: #FFFFFF; font-size: 25px; font-weight: 400; line-height: 29px; margin-bottom:10px; } #regstr-content .panel-sub-text { font-family: Roboto; height: 21px; width: 328px; color: #FFFFFF; font-size: 18px; font-style: italic; font-weight: 200; line-height: 21px; margin-bottom:28px; } .content-icon-image { width: 23px; color: #FFFFFF; font-family: FontAwesome; font-size: 26px; line-height: 26px; text-align: center; /*position:absolute;*/ } .section-label{ font-family: Roboto; padding-bottom:5px; height: 24px; width: 35px; color: #FFFFFF; font-size: 20px; /* font-weight: 500;*/ line-height: 24px; margin-bottom:5px; } .icon-txt{ display: table-cell; vertical-align: top; font-family: Roboto; padding-left:28px; padding-bottom:30px; vertical-align: top; } .section-text { font-family: Roboto; height: 36px; color: #FFFFFF; font-size: 14px; font-weight:200; line-height: 18px; } .panel-body { .content-icon-image { float: left; margin-right: 10px; } .icon-txt { display: inline-block; width: 90%; } } sp_instancetruetitan_registration_aboutfalseTitan Registration about[{"name":"panel_type","default_value":"default","type":"string"}, {"name":"content_header","default_value":"Sign Up","type":"string"}, {"name":"content_sub_header", "default_value":"Once you sign up, you can:", "type":"string"}, {"name":"icon_list", "default_value":[ ],"type":"string"}]truefalsesp_widgetneel2020-04-20 10:57:09b2175ce9db185410730a7b386896193c3Titan Registration aboutfd74bb58db109010730a7b386896199efd74bb58db109010730a7b386896199esp_widget_b2175ce9db185410730a7b386896193cneel2020-04-20 11:00:50
